entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who follow Lord Voldemort. They are known for their black robes and masks.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville Longbottom, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as emerging from nowhere with armfuls of Venomous Tentacula.

entities.name: venomous tentacula
entities.description: A type of plant that is used for defense. It loops itself around the nearest Death Eater and begins reeling him in.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as speeding down the marble staircase with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron Weasley, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as speeding down the marble staircase with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione Granger, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is described as speeding down the marble staircase with Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: The Venomous Tentacula loops itself around the nearest Death Eater and begins reeling him in.
Harry, Ron, and Hermione sped down the marble staircase together.
Harry, Ron, and Hermione sped down the marble staircase together.
